name: Hertz (itch)
description:
Hertz is an emotional adventure game flying above the world
after the great tide has swallowed the earth. 
Explore the beautiful sky, vast ocean, and uncharted islands!




Lonely yet charming world from the sky above

In the world of Hertz, the beauty of the primitive time and bitterness left by the fallen world of forgotten ones coexist.


Simple Control

A basic control of aircraft is not difficult at all.
It is so easy as riding a bicycle in the sky.

Soft and comfortable music

Soft and comfortable music will be a dear companion for your journey.
